creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two hand stitched woven panels in red, black, white and beige vertical stripes with warp self fringe (1-1 1/2"); four rows of horizontal embroidery across width; two are 1 1/2" double chevrons in white, purple and black; two are 1" double V's in same colors
dimension: 36 x 35 in. (91.44 x 88.9 cm) (including self fringe)
title: Cloth (tzute)
